message: Let's split it evenly, but I'll take a slight majority
You took a slight majority, now it's my turn to take control
Let's try again, this time with a 50/50 split
You want 50/50, I'll give you a little less, but I'll take more
I'll compromise, you take the majority, but not as much as before
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not going down without a fight
